headline: Norwegian Cruise Line Holdings to Hold Conference Call on Third Quarter 2025 Financial Results
summary: MIAMI, Oct. 21, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Norwegian Cruise Line Holdings Ltd. (NYSE: NCLH) (together with NCL Corporation Ltd., “Norwegian Cruise Line Holdings” or the “Company”) announced today it will report third quarter 2025 financial results on Tuesday, November 4, 2025 at 6:30 a.m. Eastern Time with a conference call and webcast to discuss results at 8:00 a.m. Eastern Time. The conference call will be webcast via the Company’s Investor Relations website, https://www.nclhltd.com/investors. A

headline: Norwegian Cruise Line (NCLH): How Cost-Cutting and Weak Demand Are Shaping Its Valuation Outlook
summary: Norwegian Cruise Line Holdings (NCLH) is stepping up its cost containment with new surcharges in its main dining rooms and tighter limits on room service. These efforts come as ongoing weak demand and cash flow concerns continue to shape investor sentiment. See our latest analysis for Norwegian Cruise Line Holdings. Despite Norwegian Cruise Line Holdings launching tighter cost controls and tweaking customer perks, the share price has remained volatile, down 10.3% year-to-date, while the...
